I did came up with this, but I didn't like it that much. WDYT?

ELEMENTS = "%-d %b %Y"
(...)
def to_s
    return last_day if start_date == end_date
 
    elements = ELEMENTS
    elements = elements.chomp(' %Y') if start_date.year == end_date.year
    elements = elements.chomp(' %b') if start_date.month == end_date.month
    first_day = start_date.strftime(elements)
    first_day + ' - ' + last_day
  end

def last_day
    end_date.strftime(ELEMENTS)
end

```
ELEMENTS = "%-d %b %Y"
(...)

    return last_day if start_date == end_date
 
    elements = ELEMENTS

    elements = elements.chomp(' %b') if start_date.month == end_date.month
    first_day = start_date.strftime(elements)
    first_day + ' - ' + last_day
